aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.name: Diana Pascual García
aboutMe.description: I am seeking opportunities to apply my skills in web development and new technologies. My diverse experience and focus on quality and problem-solving prepare me to contribute effectively to web development projects. I bring dedication, commitment, professionalism, and teamwork experience, ready to adapt and prove my value in this field.

items.degree: Higher Technician in Web Application Development.

items.jobTitle: DUAL Internship in Web Application Development
items.description: Advanced Java programming, Configuration and management of Maven. Implementation of SLF4J + Logback. Testing with JUnit and Mockito. Code quality validation with SonarLint. Environment and tool updates.
Staff seleccion and management. Training design and delivery. Customer service and issue resolution.
Quality team member. Trainer for family and self-management programs. Responsible for the Equality Plan. Data analysis and publication writer.

items.company: University of Seville and Oregon State University
items.description: Design of training and intervention programs. Various research tasks, including reference and database management. Participation in published documents. Family consultant and research assistant.

form.title: Contact Me
